channel.title: DestroScape PVM 317
channel.description:
Hi Mopar community,
Here is some info about our server here at Destroscape.
•Fully Working Curses •24/7 Uptime •Change-able Gameframes •Dicing •Quests •Working Nex gear w/ HP Boost •Great Pking •Economy •Variety of Mini games •Working Clan Chats •Almost all skills perfect •Completionist and Max Capes •TokHaar-Kal AND MUCH MUCH MORE
We have 3 developers working on the server every day so updates are daily and we have fixed loads of things so far.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8Ug2C.png[/img]
We do have Godwars, a jailing system and donator status.
[spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/s4zwSVf.png[/img][/spoiler]
[spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/4MwDQ0s.png[/img][/spoiler]
[spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/XUIJtdJ.png[/img][/spoiler]
[spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/EBdabUv.png[/img][/spoiler]
This is a new server and we still have alot of work to do, but we are getting new players daily and have just purchased a VPS and web hosting pre-paid for 3 months, so we will have 24/7 uptime.
some things that we have fixed so far include:
- Fully revamped firemaking 90% working
- Fully revamped Runecrafting including working pouches
- Fixed problems with hunter skill impling jars, ect
- Revamped agility
And loads more!
If your interested in joining please visit us at www.destroscape.com
Thanks guys!
Lawless
Credits to coldmedicine for source and client.
